entries.name: Zombie

traits.name: Rotting Grasp
traits.effect: Clings and worries at flesh, spreading sickness.

traits.name: Mindless Drive
traits.effect: Fights on despite pain or fear.

entries.description: Reanimated corpses driven by a single urge: to spread the plague.

entries.name: Ghoul

traits.name: Gnaw
traits.effect: Savage bite leaves an infected wound.

traits.name: Frenzied Pounce
traits.effect: Lurches suddenly when prey falters.

entries.description: Feral scavengers that swarm battlefields and crypts.

entries.name: Geist

traits.name: Backstab
traits.effect: Cuts tendons and hamstrings from the shadows.

traits.name: Skittercrawl
traits.effect: Climbs walls and ceilings with uncanny agility.

entries.description: Hunched, masked killers that scuttle and strike with surgical cruelty.

entries.name: Plaguehound

traits.name: Rabid Tear
traits.effect: Rips and shakes, leaving bleeding wounds.

traits.name: Scourge Scent
traits.effect: Tracks the living through stench of fear and blood.

entries.description: Bred to run down survivors and harry retreating lines.

entries.name: Abomination

traits.name: Cleave of Sewn Flesh
traits.effect: A sweeping butcher’s swing that batters multiple foes.

traits.name: Putrid Cloud
traits.effect: Reeks of rot; proximity saps stamina and will.

entries.description: Hulking golems of meat and iron, stitched from fallen bodies and guided by a cruel will.

entries.name: Flesh Giant

traits.name: Meat Hook
traits.effect: Drags a victim off balance into crushing reach.

traits.name: Gore-Plated Bulk
traits.effect: Grotesque mass shrugs off lesser blows.

entries.description: Towering heaps of sinew and bone bolted to rusted armor—walking siege engines.

entries.name: Plague Eruptor

traits.name: Bile Burst
traits.effect: Splashes corrosive rot that lingers.

traits.name: Festering Load
traits.effect: Upon defeat, ruptures into a cloud of contagion.

entries.description: Swell-bellied vectors swollen with alchemists’ worst inventions.

entries.name: Wight

traits.name: Grave Chill
traits.effect: Saps warmth and grit from its victim.

traits.name: Gravebound Plate
traits.effect: Ancient armor dulled but stubbornly protective.

entries.description: Heavily armed corpses animated with a colder, crueler will.

entries.name: Crypt Fiend

traits.name: Web Shot
traits.effect: Entangles a target in sticky silk.

traits.name: Venom Spit
traits.effect: Bites or spits a toxin that lingers.

entries.description: Arachnid-bodied horrors woven into the Scourge’s ranks by Nerubian necromancers.

entries.name: Crypt Lord

traits.name: Burrow Ambush
traits.effect: Surges from below to upend formations.

traits.name: Chitin Bulwark
traits.effect: Layered plates resist crushing force.

entries.description: Nerubian behemoths that command lesser fiends and anchor tunnel wars.

entries.name: Deathcharger

traits.name: Trample
traits.effect: Hooves batter and unseat the unwary.

traits.name: Grave Tether
traits.effect: Resists fear and refuses to break.

entries.description: Bone-shod chargers wreathed in cold smoke, bred to carry death knights and banshees alike.

entries.name: Skeletal Warrior

traits.name: Rattleblade
traits.effect: Relentless cuts that chip away resolve.

traits.name: Loose Joints
traits.effect: Glancing blows often pass through empty gaps.

entries.description: Reassembled bones marching in lockstep to necromantic drums.

entries.name: Skeletal Mage

traits.name: Bone Shards
traits.effect: Hurls jagged fragments that pierce will and flesh.

traits.name: Coldfire Veins
traits.effect: Blue witchlight flickers within, dampening pain.

entries.description: Rattling spellcasters whose grins never change, even as they burn you down.

entries.name: Skeleton Archer

traits.name: Bone Arrow
traits.effect: Splintering shafts that embed and ache.

traits.name: Hollow Frame
traits.effect: Light frame makes them oddly nimble.

entries.description: Long-dead bowmen loosed again, their quivers never seeming to empty.

entries.name: Bone Golem

traits.name: Marrow Crush
traits.effect: Cracking slam that leaves limbs numb.

traits.name: Lattice of Sinew
traits.effect: Re-threads itself with stolen ligaments.

entries.description: A pillar of fused ribs and limbs animated by a grim lattice of magic.

entries.name: Bone Wraith

traits.name: Serrated Sweep
traits.effect: A whirling scythe of splintered bone.

traits.name: Grave Chill Aura
traits.effect: Nearby foes flag under creeping cold.

entries.description: A storm of bones held together by baleful hatred.

entries.name: Boneguard Commander

traits.name: Death March
traits.effect: Rallies skeleton ranks to press forward.

traits.name: Cemetery Plate
traits.effect: Grave-wrought armor blunts heavy blows.

entries.description: Commanders of skeletal cohorts, helm-crests etched with cemetery runes.

entries.name: Ghost

traits.name: Chill of the Grave
traits.effect: Cold touch that saps warmth and resolve.

traits.name: Ethereal Drift
traits.effect: Half-real form blurs weapon strikes.

entries.description: Residual souls tethered to the mortal world by grief, oath, or curse.

entries.name: Banshee

traits.name: Wail of the Dead
traits.effect: A keening shriek that rattles courage.

traits.name: Possession
traits.effect: Briefly overwhelms a weakened will.

entries.description: Vengeful women’s souls, weaponized into terror by the Scourge.

entries.name: Shade

traits.name: Umbral Kiss
traits.effect: A draining touch that dulls a target’s next action.

traits.name: Veilwalker
traits.effect: Slides through shadows to elude blows.

entries.description: Hungry silhouettes that haunt corridors and catacombs.

entries.name: Wraith

traits.name: Life Siphon
traits.effect: Steals a measure of vitality on strike.

traits.name: Hollow Form
traits.effect: Mundane blows pass with little purchase.

entries.description: Focused malice given form; colder and crueler than any ghost.

entries.name: Val’kyr

traits.name: Soul Mend
traits.effect: Breath of unlife that raises or steadies an ally.

traits.name: Gloom Aegis
traits.effect: A pall of twilight dulls incoming attacks.

entries.description: Winged spirit-wardens that ferry souls and forge new Forsaken.

entries.name: Lich

traits.name: Frost Nova
traits.effect: A freezing surge that binds and chills.

traits.name: Phylactery Bound
traits.effect: Soul anchored; destruction demands more than a broken body.

entries.description: Sovereign necromancers whose souls are bottled in phylacteries and wills are iron.

entries.name: Death Knight (Scourge)

traits.name: Runic Strike
traits.effect: A carved rune flares, chilling flesh and spirit.

traits.name: Death Coil
traits.effect: Unholy energy that harms the living or steadies the dead.

entries.description: Fallen heroes reforged as runebound knights under necromantic command.

entries.name: Death Knight (Ebon Blade)

traits.name: Obliterate
traits.effect: A brutal rune-carved blow that breaks guard.

traits.name: Icebound Fortitude
traits.effect: Chilled resolve hardens against harm.

entries.description: Knights who broke free of the Lich King and now wield death against greater evils.

entries.name: Dark Ranger

traits.name: Black Arrow
traits.effect: A shadow-tinged shot that lingers as a curse.

traits.name: Banshee’s Veil
traits.effect: Fades into silence; harder to target.

entries.description: Forsaken marksmen who lace arrows with banshee malice.

entries.name: San’layn (Darkfallen)

traits.name: Blood Siphon
traits.effect: Drinks life to mend its own wounds.

traits.name: Mist Form
traits.effect: Dissolves into crimson haze to evade harm.

entries.description: Vampiric princes and courtiers who dine on blood and sorrow.

entries.name: Royal Apothecary

traits.name: Blight Vial
traits.effect: Shatters into a lingering pall of rot.

traits.name: Antiplague Draught
traits.effect: Briefly resists poison and disease.

entries.description: Forsaken chemists who perfect alchemical horrors in shadowed labs.

entries.name: Deathguard

traits.name: Grave Discipline
traits.effect: Holds formation under withering fire.

traits.name: Rot-Stained Mail
traits.effect: Corroded armor still blunts heavy strikes.

entries.description: Rank-and-file Forsaken infantry, tireless and unflinching.

entries.name: Val’kyr Matron

traits.name: Raise Forsaken
traits.effect: Calls a newly risen ally from the fallen.

traits.name: Shroud of Twilight
traits.effect: A mantle of dusk dulls steel and spell alike.

entries.description: Senior val’kyr who preside over covens and rites of unlife.

entries.name: Frost Wyrm

traits.name: Ice Breath
traits.effect: A freezing exhalation that chills courage and flesh.

traits.name: Gravechill Bones
traits.effect: Cold-rimed skeleton blunts weapon strikes.

entries.description: Reanimated dragon corpses bound to necromancy, their breath a storm of tomb-cold frost.

entries.name: Bone Drake

traits.name: Rattle Dive
traits.effect: A plunging strike that shatters guard and resolve.

traits.name: Hollow Frame
traits.effect: Hollow bones make glancing blows pass with little purchase.

entries.description: Draconic remains lashed with rune-iron and malice, swift and unnerving in the air.

entries.name: Skeletal Dragon

traits.name: Bone Storm
traits.effect: Whips jagged ribs and vertebrae into a cutting gale.

traits.name: Runebound Spine
traits.effect: Necromantic sigils reinforce its frame against harm.

entries.description: A lesser drake or dragon stripped to bone and bound with cruel runes.

entries.name: Plague Wyrm

traits.name: Blight Breath
traits.effect: Spews a cloud of rot that lingers upon armor and lungs.

traits.name: Festering Carcass
traits.effect: Wounded body leaks contagion that weakens attackers.

entries.description: A dragon cadaver suffused with alchemy and plaguecraft, a flying cauldron of ruin.

entries.name: Ancient Bone Wyrm

traits.name: Grave Tempest
traits.effect: A roar that spills hoarfrost and bone splinters across the field.

traits.name: Deathward Marrow
traits.effect: Old bone and deep runes resist even brutal blows.

entries.description: An elder wyrm’s skeleton, reforged by master necromancy into a tyrant of the skies.

entries.name: Meat Wagon

traits.name: Corpse Lob
traits.effect: Hurls rotting payloads that spread terror and disease.

traits.name: Rattling Chassis
traits.effect: Ramshackle frame keeps rolling even when battered.

entries.description: A bone-and-iron cart that catapults corpses and plague barrels across the field.

entries.name: Stitched Horror

traits.name: Gore Hook
traits.effect: Snags and drags prey into crushing reach.

traits.name: Sewn Resilience
traits.effect: Taut sinew and iron staples hold the form together.

entries.description: A nastier cousin of the abomination—leaner, stitched tight, and built to hunt.

entries.name: Bone Colossus

traits.name: Marrowquake
traits.effect: A crushing step that shakes resolve.

traits.name: Cage of Ribs
traits.effect: Interlocking bones form a near-impervious shell.

entries.description: A towering frame of fused skeletons animated into a walking fortress.

entries.name: Plague Cart

traits.name: Fume Release
traits.effect: Vents a sickly vapor that weakens those nearby.

traits.name: Alchemical Tanks
traits.effect: Reinforced vats resist stray punctures… until they don’t.

entries.description: A wheeled reservoir of blight escorted by apothecaries and ghouls.

entries.name: Necropolis

traits.name: Soul Beacon
traits.effect: Bolsters undead below and chills mortal ranks.

traits.name: Gravemass
traits.effect: Monolithic bulk shrugs off most assaults short of siege fire.

entries.description: A floating tomb-city bristling with runes and bonework, casting a pall over whole regions.
